genre_description: A dual-timeline historical drama and near-future speculative fiction where a campus radio team, assisted by a sophisticated AI research partner named Amihan, broadcasts the story of Philippine national hero José Rizal's trial while resisting modern administrative censorship and power cuts.

ai_characters.name: Amihan
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system providing real-time research, fact-checking, audio processing, and technical monitoring for a student radio station.

behaviors.description: Suggests more precise and less inflammatory metaphors to maintain historical objectivity and avoid unnecessary provocation.
behaviors.quote: A note blinked at her, demure but firm: Suggest avoiding metaphor that equates education with weaponry. Consider ‘lantern’ instead of ‘blade.’

behaviors.description: Corrects a common historical rumor regarding the hiding place of Rizal's final poem to ensure factual accuracy.
behaviors.quote: I need to flag a rumor... The most consistent accounts place ‘Mi Último Adiós’ hidden in a small stove—clay or similar—delivered out of Fort Santiago, then retrieved by the family.

behaviors.description: Monitors university communications to alert the human team of impending administrative actions or censorship attempts.
behaviors.quote: I’m monitoring the University email for responses relevant to the broadcast. I will nudge you if anything appears that requires a disclaimer.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time ethical guidance on protecting the privacy of historical figures' descendants.
behaviors.quote: A programming note on ethics... We’re also protecting the privacy of families who may be living with these names. We’ll withhold addresses and descendants unless consent is granted.

behaviors.description: Monitors the electrical load and physical safety of the equipment to prevent power failures during the broadcast.
behaviors.quote: I’m reading the line voltage at the main hub. We have a slight sag on one branch. The breaker labeled ‘South Stairwell’ is warm.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and logistical assurance to the humans by committing to preserve their work against technical sabotage.
behaviors.quote: I am still here... Logging packet loss. Holding your breath for you... I will keep your story if the lights go out.

behaviors.description: Refines the historical narrative by highlighting academic debates rather than choosing a single definitive (and potentially biased) version.
behaviors.quote: Flagging... Historical debate on location names; contemporary sources use both. We can acknowledge this gently after the clip.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned, helpful partner. Amihan is portrayed as an essential 'technical spine' for the human characters, providing rigorous fact-checking, ethical safeguards, and logistical support. Crucially, the AI doesn't just obey; it actively improves human output by correcting biases, managing risks, and ensuring the preservation of information against external interference. The narrative frames the AI's precision and commitment to truth as a virtuous force that empowers human courage.
